No Champions Trophy warm-up matches for India, Australia and PakistanIndia and Australia have opted out of Champions Trophy warm-ups, while Pakistan has scheduled three with their Shaheen squads. Rohit Sharma's squad will rely on their ODI series win over England as sufficient preparation for the tournament in Dubai.

Chahal's advice for next-gen IPL spinners: Make yourself mentally toughYuzvendra Chahal, the leading wicket-taker in the IPL, has said that new-age spinners need to be mentally tough to survive in the tournament. He has advised youngsters to learn how to handle pressure.

Champions Trophy: Spencer Johnson hoping to replicate Mitchell Starc in PakistanAustralia's Spencer Johnson is hoping that he can replicate senior left-arm pacer Mitchell Starc's heroics during the upcoming Champions Trophy in Pakistan. Johnson has been picked as a replacement for Starc in the squad for the tournament.

Unsung Hero KL Rahul completes stunning redemption with Champions Trophy winKL Rahul redemption arc is perhaps one of less discussed stories in the Champions Trophy. Rahul's ability to adapt to conditions and deliver under pressure should earn him more plaudits than what they have in the recent times.

Arne Slot says Liverpool 'unlucky' to face PSG after Champions League exitLiverpool manager Arne Slot rues his side's misfortune after crashing out of the Champions League against PSG, despite being the best side in the league phase.

Two-tier Test cricket system proposal fair? South Africa's Graeme Smith reactsFormer South Africa captain Graeme Smith said teams like South Africa, West Indies and Sri Lanka need to be strong to ensure Test cricket remains competitive. The legendary cricketer expressed concerns about the reportedly proposed idea of a two-tier system for the traditional format.

KKR Preview: Ajinkya Rahane in for big challenge in title defence campaignIPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) will look to defend their crown under their new skipper Ajinkya Rahane with Venkatesh Ier as his deputy. The Knight Riders will begin their title defence against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in the opening match of the tournament.

IPL 2025: Virat Kohli, Rajat Patidar frontrunners for RCB captaincy roleIPLL 2025: Virat Kohli and Rajat Patidar are frontrunners to be named as the new Royal Challengers Bengaluru skipper for the upcoming IPL 2025 season. Both men were retained by the franchise ahead of the new season.

Rohit Sharma shouldn't play Tests anymore, he made wrong call in Sydney: KaifFormer batter Mohammad Kaif criticised Rohit Sharma's decision to sit out the final match of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy. Rohit acknowledged his poor run with the bat and took the bold call. India lost the series finale by six wickets and conceded the coveted trophy to Australia.

Ali Fazal, Richa Chadha broke fixed deposits to fund Girls Will Be GirlsActors Richa Chadha and Ali Fazal broke their fixed deposits to fund their debut production Girls Will Be Girls, which has been praised for its portrayal of adolescent challenges. The film premiered at international festivals and is now available on Prime Video.

No mean feat: Temba Bavuma braces for WTC final vs AustraliaSA vs PAK: South African skipper Temba Bavuma said that the Proteas are ready to face Australia in the World Test Championship final. On Monday, South Africa beat Pakistan by 10 wickets in Cape Town to win the series 2-0.
